thread.title: Tesla Stations at Airbnb Locations - The New York Times
thread.title_full: Tesla Stations at Airbnb Locations - The New York Times

author: Shivani Vora
title: Tesla Stations at Airbnb Locations - The New York Times
text:
Continue reading the main story Share This Page Continue reading the main story Continue reading the main story Airbnb and Tesla Motors are starting a partnership to bring Tesla car charging stations to 30 Airbnb properties along the West Coast in cities such as Los Angeles, Palm Springs and Healdsburg, Calif. Tesla has donated and installed the stations that are meant to give travelers freedom on their road trips, according to Chip Conley, head of global hospitality and strategy at Airbnb. “When considering accommodations, Tesla drivers are limited by how far they can get on their car’s battery charge, but this partnership alleviates that constraint,” he said.
